document.full_text: the defense department inspector general has cleared gen. stanley a. mcchrystal and his aides of wrongdoing after an inquiry into a magazine profile that resulted in the general's resignation.
document.title: pentagon inquiry into article clears mcchrystal and aides
lines_and_colors: the defense department inspector general has cleared gen. stanley a. mcchrystal and his aides of wrongdoing after an inquiry into a magazine profile that resulted in the general's resignation.
